I agree on adding emarketing as additional "owner" when enabling the Google Site Verification. This is required for authorizing emarketing to import my product data through the API. Of course I can revoke this consent at any time. Under no circumstances will emarketing use, share or save my data for purposes other than my campaign control.

When performing the verification, the Magento Cache will be flushed.
